attributes.action: Ban all Genetically Modified Organisms in the UK and Europe
attributes.additional_details:
Ban genetically modified plants in the UK and whole Europe

because

1. consequences of long term exposition are
    unknown and studies show food made from
    GMO plants causes tumors:
    http://www.motherearthnews.com/natural-health/gmo-safety-zmgz13amzsto.aspx

2. genetically modified organisms may affect local
    ecosystems once released to environment.
    Such release virtually can not be avoided when
    plants are cultivated on large scale.
    This can be similar to outcome of introduction of
    Heracleum sosnowskyi in Europe
    where it can not be eliminated and still spreads.
    Note: All parts of Heracleum sosnowskyi contain
            the intense toxic allergen furanocoumarin.
            It is dangerous for humans because even
            small drops of plant's juice
            cause photosensitivity and burns.
